about.title: A dedicated Developer | Programmer
about.text: From my early days of coding, I've been fascinated by the power of application and web development. I currently specialize in Dart, JavaScript, and am proficient in frameworks like Flutter and React. My toolkit also includes HTML, CSS, Git, and Firebase, which help me build robust, user-friendly applications.
